readable.title: 3560726559_4c4bed9f2d
readable.content: A man and a woman holding hands try to go their opposite ways . A well dressed young couple hold hands and pull in different directions in front of trees . A young boy wearing a suit and top hat is holding hands with a girl in a green dress . The man in the black suit and hat is holding the hand of the girl in the green dress whilst looking away from each other . Young couple in formal attire hold hands
